modules.description: This module directly interacts with HID devices through operations like enumeration, opening connections by vendor/product ID or path, and reading from or writing to devices using raw byte buffers. It handles device management with initialization, deinitialization, and non-blocking mode configuration, working with HID device paths, vendor and product identifiers, and structured device metadata. Concrete use cases include communicating with USB HID peripherals like gamepads, sensors, or custom hardware for input/output operations.
